Name: perm-usw2-mno-vc-cloudadmin

Description: Administrator permissions to the SDDC TCA instance.

Description: Administrator permissions to the SDDC TCA instance. Enables removing sysadmin privileges once Infrastructre Automation privileges are available separately.

Description: Grants access to advanced VMC infrastructure views. Added to SSO group CloudAdminGroup.

Description: Administrator permissions to the Market Pod 1 vCenter Server.

Name: perm-usw2-mp01-vc-cloudadmin
Description: Reduced administrator permissions to match VMC.

Name: perm-usw2-mp01-vc-infrastructure developer
Description: Limited permissions to the Market Pod 1 vCenter Server.

Name: perm-usw2-mkt01-vc-tkg operator

Name: perm-usw2-mp01-vro-administrators
Description: Adminitrator permissions to the Market Pod 1 vRO instance.
